review: This is the second chromecast I own. It works great. Occasionally the netflix app freezes as I switch devices but I think that is more of a Netflix flaw than a chromecast flaw. Maybe once a month it needs rebooted but thats as simple as unplugging and replugging it in. Not a big deal to me. I love it since we don't have cable.
author: lathamjy

review: I love it. very easy to use. and good price

review: Simply put, this thing is awesome. If I ever get more than 1 TV in my house, you can bet each and every one will have a Chromecast.
author: Jeremy

review: It works. THat's all there is to it. It works, works well, is easy, it's cheap, worth the $$$ fo' sho;
author: James D. Summar

review: I bought this device because the descriptions say you can use it to play videos from your cell phone on your TV.  What they don't tell you is that you need wifi to do that.  Both the playing device and the Chromecast must be connected to your wifi connection.I already have a computer connected to my TV, so I only bought this device to play videos over my phone's data connection.  It doesn't do that, so I will have to return mine.
author: Rev. Moonshine
